name: WormIt
description:
This is an very early release to help me to test the game. The objective of this is to realize if the game is really fun to play or not. Also to improve game mechanics and get feedback.

The project

It started just as an idea for a gamejam months ago, but I didn't get to finish the game in time (it was a 24 or 48 hours gamejam).
Then I realized that  I really liked the game idea, so following Thomas Brush's (Game developer and youtuber) advice "Release a crappy game" (He means that releasing a game, no matter the quality of it, will empower you to improve and make better games) , I decided to finish the game and release it as my first tiny, but completed,  game.
Weeks and months past by and the project is getting a bit longer than expected but also the results better.
So here I am, releasing the first prototype of the game and I hope you all enjoy the game as much I enjoy developing it.
